name: id
comment: ID. Connector ID number. ID of the cohort study which is necessary to allow participants to join (type: string)

name: name
comment: Name. Lowercase system name for the data source. Obtain a token from 3rd party data source

name: display_name
comment: Display Name. Pretty display name for the data source. Ex: Trader Joe's Bedtime Tea (type: string)

name: image
comment: Image. URL to the image of the connector logo. Ex: https://web.quantimo.do/img/logos/quantimodo-logo-qm-rainbow-200-200.png (type: string)

name: get_it_url
comment: Get It Url. URL to a site where one can get this device or application. Ex: https://quantimo.do (type: string)

name: short_description
comment: Short Description. Short description of the service (such as the categories it tracks). Ex: Tracks anything (type: string)

name: long_description
comment: Long Description. Longer paragraph description of the data provider. Ex: QuantiModo is a Chrome extension, Android app, iOS app, and web app that allows you to easily track mood, symptoms, or any outcome you want to optimize in a fraction of a second.  You can also import your data from over 30 other apps and devices like Fitbit, Rescuetime, Jawbone Up, Withings, Facebook, Github, Google Calendar, Runkeeper, MoodPanda, Slice, Google Fit, and more.  QuantiModo then analyzes your data to identify which hidden factors are most likely to be influencing your mood or symptoms and their optimal daily values. (type: string)

name: enabled
comment: Enabled. Set to 1 if the connector should be returned when listing connectors. If a tracking reminder is enabled, tracking reminder notifications will be generated for this variable. (type: boolean)

name: oauth
comment: Oauth. Set to 1 if the connector uses OAuth authentication as opposed to username/password.

name: qm_client
comment: QuantiModoClient. Whether its a connector or one of our clients.

name: created_at
comment: Time at which the Connector was Created At. When the record was first created. Use UTC ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss datetime format. Time zone should be UTC and not local. (type: string)  in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS in the UTC timezone.

name: updated_at
comment: Time at which the Connector was Updated At. When the record was last updated. Use UTC ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss datetime format. Time zone should be UTC and not local. (type: string)  in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS in the UTC timezone.

name: client_id
comment: Client ID. Your client id can be obtained by creating an app at https://builder.quantimo.do (type: string)

name: deleted_at
comment: Time at which the Connector was Deleted At.  in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS in the UTC timezone.
